name: Frozen Strawberry-banana Treat
description: Creamy and refreshing, this frozen dessert is delicious and dairy-free! An excellent low fat and low sugar alternative to ice cream. Classic strawberry and banana come together to make this sweet treat a favorite way to get your daily fruit!

ingredients.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix or Strawberry Margarita Mix

preparation: Place ingredients in food processor and blend until creamy, scraping down the sides as necessary.
